name: Vector Tank
description:
Vector Tank is a small arcade-style game about shooting aliems (sic) in which abusing the curvature of your tiny planetoid is your only means of aiming your shots.

Gameplay video courtesy of Fervir (fervir.itch.io/ , @blankthevidya)

Soundtrack can be downloaded for free here:

http://iyashikei.bandcamp.com/album/vector-tank-os...
